Atividade 1
Gabriel Andreiczuk

128| 64 | 32 | 16 | 8 | 4 | 2 | 1 |
 
a)00001111.11001010.00100100.00011111
R=15.202.36.31

8+4+2+1 = 15
128+64+8+2 = 202
32+4 = 36
16+8+4+2+1 = 31

b)11110101.00100111.00011111.10000000
R= 245.39.31.128

128+64+32+16+4+1= 245
32+4+2+1 = 39
16+8+4+2+1 = 31
128

c) 11101110.00010011.11111111.00000001
R=238.19.255.1

128+64+32+8+4+2= 238
16+2+1 = 19
128+64+32+16+8+4+2+1 = 255
1
